mapper.select: select * from chat c, profile p where (c.cId=p.pId and c.crId=#{crId} and p.pId != #{pId}) or (c.cId=p.pId and c.crId=#{crId2} and p.pId != #{pId})
select * from profile p, chat c, msg m where m.chroom=c.crId and c.crId=#{crId} and c.cId=p.pId and p.pId != #{mgSender} order by mgDate ASC
mapper.insert: insert into msg(mgSender, mgDetail, chroom) values (#{mgSender}, #{mgDetail}, #{chroom})
